entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
